circumstances: At liftoff at San Juan-Luis Muñoz Marín Airport runway 10, the twin engine airplane banked left then crashed. All five occupants were injured, the pilot seriously.
probable_cause: Uncontrolled collision with ground during initial climb following a premature liftoff. It was determined that the airplane crashed 3 minutes and 55 seconds after a Lockheed L-1011 TriStar took off from the same runway 10.
